mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product.productitem ( productName, productCode, productPrice, productCount, productSeller, productViewCount ) VALUES ( #{productName}, (select MAX(productCode) + 1 from product.productitem code), #{productPrice}, #{productCount}, #{productSeller}, '0' );
mapper.select: SELECT productName, productCode, productPrice, productCount, productSeller, productViewCount FROM product.productitem;
